column5: 28 Chinese nationals were arrested in Cambodia after crossing the border illegally.------Police and the court inspected a construction site along Sisowath/corner of Street 100
column6: in Sangkat Wat Phnom Khan Daun Penh
column7: Phnom Penh.------ A total of 40 workers
column8: including 5 women were questioned. 28 Chinese nationals had a passport but no work permit and 9  Chinese nationals were without a passport and suspected of illegally entering Cambodia.------They were taken to the immigration department to follow up with dentention and deportation and the others without a work permit were questioned for legal action.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/312516
